ðŸ“– Summary: Copyparty is a portable file server that supports resumable uploads and downloads through a web browser. It offers multiple protocols including HTTP, WebDAV, FTP, TFTP, and SMB, and provides features like media indexing, thumbnails, file management, and sharing capabilities. It can be deployed on various devices and has optional Android and iOS integrations.
